description: Many of Labrynna's enemies still lacked their firearms and so the need for armor geared towards medieval weaponry continued. Using the latest studies from their Institutions the Labrynnians were able to perfect all styles of protection.
tooltip: Many of Labrynna's enemies still lacked their firearms and so the need for armor geared towards medieval weaponry continued. Using the latest studies from their Institutions the Labrynnians were able to perfect all styles of protection. (+25 non-magic armor increase for all Infantry)
